title: Neumorphism UI Showcase
description: A modern neumorphic UI component showcase featuring interactive controls with soft shadow aesthetics and smooth animations.
coverStyle: background: linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff, #f0f0f0); color: #2c3e50; box-shadow: 20px 20px 60px rgba(174, 187, 207, 0.4), -20px -20px 60px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
